item.title: Delight in the Little Moments
item.description: This last Easter I had some fun with the kids at their grandparents. Remember the days of spinning until you were nauseous? Was fun to watch the kids enjoying this so I took a few clips, nothing fancy, just a snapshot of enjoying the little moments in life. Thinking I’ll try this approach for a while. Small 2 minute videos that aren’t refined a lot are easy for me to produce.
